import React, { Component } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' //import ShowBook from './ShowBook' //import { Link, Route } from 'react-router-dom' class BookTableRow extends Component { static propTypes = { books: PropTypes.array.isRequired, onUpdateShelf: PropTypes.func.isRequired } render() { const books1 = this.props.books.filter(books => books.shelf === 'currentlyReading'); const books2 = this.props.books.filter(books => books.shelf === 'read'); const books3 = this.props.books.filter(books => books.shelf === 'wantToRead'); const onUpdateShelf = this.props.onUpdateShelf return (

Currently Reading

    {books1.map((Book) => (
  1. {Book.title}
    {Book.authers}
    2. ))}

Read

    {books2.map((Book) => (
  1. {Book.title}
    {Book.authers}
    2. ))}

Want to Read

    {books3.map((Book) => (
  1. {Book.title}
    {Book.authers}
    2. ))}
); } } export default BookTableRow
